arts.ttl: Who will win Aberdeen vs Shakhtar Donetsk? Our writers predict the Europa Conference League clash
arts.sum: The Ukrainian heavyweights arrive in Glasgow as one of the favourites to lift the trophy

arts.ttl: Aberdeen vs Shakhtar Donetsk predictions: Struggling Dons to be shut out by Shakhtar
arts.sum: Aberdeen face Shakhtar Donetsk in the Conference League on Thursday and James Milton expects another tough night for the out-of-form hosts at Pittodrie.
